title: Kingdom of Libya
summary: The Kingdom of Libya (Arabic: المملكة الليبية‎, romanized: Al-Mamlakah Al-Lībiyya, lit. 'Libyan Kingdom'; Italian: Regno di Libia; Berber languages: ⵜⴰⴳⵍⴷⵉⵜ ⵏ ⵍⵉⴱⵢⴰ), known as the United Kingdom of Libya until 1963, came into existence upon independence on 24 December 1951 and lasted until a coup d'état, led by Muammar Gaddafi, on 1 September 1969 overthrew King Idris and established the Libyan Arab Republic.
